    <metadata>
      <schema>http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/LOM</schema>
      <lom xsi:schemaLocation="http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/LOM http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/lomv1.0/lomLoose.xsd" xmlns="http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/LOM">
        <general>
          <identifier>
            <catalog>ILMoE</catalog>
            <entry>ILMoE1047</entry>
          </identifier>
          <title>
            <string language="en">Weather and Its Symbols</string>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Wetter und seine Symbole</string>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">Survivez à et ses symboles</string>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">Tempo e seus símbolos</string>
            <string language="x-mt-it">Tempo ed i relativi simboli</string>
            <string language="x-mt-el">Καιρός και τα σύμβολά του</string>
            <string language="x-mt-es">Tiempo y sus símbolos</string>
          </title>
          <language>en</language>
          <description>
            <string language="en">The learners will match media symbols for weather with their vocabulary.</string>
          </description>
          <keyword>
            <string language="en">lesson plan</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="en">weather reort</string>
          </keyword>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Die Anfänger bringen Mediasymbole für Wetter 
mit ihrem Wortschatz zusammen.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">Les étudiants apparieront des medias que les 
symboles pour survivent à avec leur vocabulaire.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">Os learners combinarão símbolos dos media para 
o tempo com seu vocabulário.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-it">I principianti abbineranno i simboli di media per
tempo con il loro vocabolario.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-el">Οι αρχάριοι θα ταιριάξουν με τα σύμβολα μέσων για τον 
καιρό το λεξιλόγιό τους.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-es">Los principiantes corresponderán con los 
símbolos de los media para el tiempo con su vocabulario.</string>
          </description>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Lektionplan</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Wetter reort</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">plan de leçon</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">survivez à au reort</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">planta da lição</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">reort do tempo</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-it">programma di lezione</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-it">reort del tempo</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-el">σχέδιο μαθήματος</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-el">καιρός reort</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-es">plan de la lección</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
